In India there is an enormous gap between healthcare supply and demand. What do you think are the major steps that can be taken by the government to improve patient care in the country?

"HEALTH IS WEALTH" It is a quotation which is given by great persons in the world.They said many things about health.Now a days government is not taking care of health care.Health care is a crucial part in our economy.Many of our leaders are not taking care of general public,it is very important to take care of them.

In order to develop health care in our economy government have to plan many things regarding it.Mainly government have to consider the main hospitals which comes under it and those hospitals must be developed.

Government has to develop the hospitals in terms of their infrastructure and their environment.Government should supply the quality medicines to the hospitals.These medices plays a crucial role in hospitals as well as in invidual life.Firstly govrnment should consider about the hospitals,their facilities and their services to the patients.

It is important to take care of the patients.It is important to take of the halth care in our economy.It may leads to a development of our nation as well as of our country.Government has to take the following steps to improve the patient care in our economy:

1.To take care of hospitals which comes under the government.

2.To supply the medicines in sufficient way to the hospitals.

3.To maintain quality in the medicines which are supplying to the hospitals.

4.To take care of infrastructure and facilities of the hospitals.

5.The major thing is to take care of the patients.

6.Providing a good facilities,medicines,food,services to the patients in the hospitals.

7.Government should pass a rule to the hospitals stating that the doctors should be on time in the hospitals.

8.Government must allocate appropriate budjet to the health care sevices.

9.Even government must take care of hospitals which are located in rural areas,providing the medicines on time to those areas.

10.Government should make a note of services which are rendering in those hospitals.

According to me government is not taking of health care services in our country right now.The govrnment have to lay down some rules,plans and responsibilities to the hospitals.It must allocate the sufficient budjet to the hospitals.Government should also increase the timings of consultation the hositals.According to me many people feel that govrnment medines are good and they can easily solve our health problems.Government should not cheat the general public.

It should also take care of the functions of the hospitals.Comparing to other countries our countries health care services are not good like quality of medicines and services of hospitals.Recently i read a news about a hospitals stating that some hospitals are giving expired medicines to its patients.

Government should take care of all these factors which are effecting the health care services in our country and see to it that maintaing good relationship with the general public.
